00014 class Polygonizer
00015 {
00016         
00017 public:
00018         
00019         enum MarchMethod
00020         {
00021                 MM_CUBES,
00022                 MM_TETRA
00023         };
00024         
00025         // typedefs for improved readibility
00026         typedef Set<Color> ColorList;
00027         typedef Set<Vector> VectorList;
00028         typedef Real (*Function)(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ);
00029 
00030         // main constructor
00031         Polygonizer(Function pvFunction=NULL, 
00032                                 Int iCellCount=8, 
00033                                 Real fScale = 1.0, 
00034                                 Real fIsoLevel=1.0);
00035         
00036         // evaluates the given function
00037         inline Real sample(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ);
00038         
00039         // function access methods
00040         inline void setFunction( Function pvFunction );
00041         
00042         // inverse normals methods (for density functions)
00043         inline void setInverseNormals(bool bInvNormals);
00044         inline bool getInverseNormals();
00045         
00046         // cell count access methods
00047         inline void setCellCount( Int iCellCount );
00048         inline Int getCellCount();
00049         
00050         // iso access methods
00051         inline void setIsoLevel( Real fIsoLevel );
00052         inline Real getIsoLevel();
00053         
00054         // function evaluation offset access methods
00055         inline void setOffset( Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ );     
00056         inline void getOffset(Real& fX, Real& fY, Real& fZ );
00057         
00058         // function evaluation scale access methods
00059         inline void setScale(Real fScale);
00060         inline Real getScale();
00061         
00062         // normal evaluation epsilon access methods
00063         inline void setEpsilon(Real fEpsilon);
00064         inline Real getEpsilon();
00065         
00066         inline VectorList& getVertices(){ return m_kVertexList; }
00067         inline VectorList& getNormals(){ return m_kNormalList; }
00068         inline ColorList& getColors(){ return m_kColorList; }
00069                 
00070         // interpolates between two values to determine a point of intersection
00071         inline Real getIntersect(Real fV1, Real fV2, Real fLevel);
00072                 
00073         // interprets position and normal and assigns a color
00074         inline void getColor(Color &rkColor, Vector &rkPos, Vector &rkNormal);
00075         
00076         // calculates a normal by sampling the given function at several locations
00077         void getNormal(Vector &rkNormal, Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ);
00078         
00079         // marches a single cube
00080         void marchCube(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ, Real fScale);
00081         
00082         // marches a single tetrahedron
00083         void marchTetra(Vector *pakTetraPos, Real *pafTetraValue);
00084         
00085         // marches a single cube by using six tetrahedrons
00086         void marchTetraCube(Real fX, Real fY, Real fZ, Real fScale);
00087         
00088         // evaluates the given function, creating the geometry
00089         void evaluate(MarchMethod eType=MM_TETRA);
00090         
00091 protected:
00092 
00093         Function m_pvFunction;
00094

00103
